headline: BofA Maintains a Buy Rating on PG&E Corporation (PCG), Sets a $24 PT
summary: PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) is one of the best cheap stocks with huge upside potential. On June 11, Bank of America Securities analyst Ross Fowler maintained a Buy rating on PG&E Corporation (NYSE:PCG) and set a price target of $24.00. The company’s fiscal Q1 2025 earnings showed GAAP earnings of $0.28 per share, compared to earnings […]
